data.prayer: Father, help the 1,870,831 believers in Valparaíso to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 6,255,869 lost friends and neighbors.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Valparaíso, Chile

data.prayer: Father, please send teachers of your Word in Valparaíso who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 4 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, reveal best practices for sharing the gospel in the state of Valparaíso.
Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in Valparaíso. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Jew, Spanish-speaking people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Jew, Spanish-speaking people know you.
Jesus, please help the 1,870,831 believers in the state of Valparaíso to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.
Lord we pray you unite the 1,870,831 believers to pray at all times in the Spirit, with all prayer and supplication, for spiritual breakthrough in Valparaíso.
data.verse: in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

data.section_summary:
the state of Valparaíso, Chile has a population of 8,126,700.

We estimate Valparaíso has 1,870,831 people who might know Jesus, 5,210,117 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,045,752 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 4 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, please give the 1,870,831 believers in the state of Valparaíso the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.
